page.title: 17TRANSPORT AROUND WIRKSWORTH
page.content: MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL AROUND THE AREA IN PRIVATE CARS. THE ONLY WAY TO REACH MANY PARTS OF THE AREA AS THE ONLY PUBLIC TRANSPORT, THE BUS SERVICE FROM DERBY TO MATLOCK, KEEPS TO THE MAIN B5023, THE OTHER ROADS BEING TOO STEEP OR NARROW. THE MINERAL RAILWAY IS USED LESS AND LESS. THE GPO HAVE NO RIDE WITH THE MAIL FACILITY IN THIS AREA. MANY LORRIES USE THE ROADS TO TRANSPORT LIMESTONE. THIS IS A MAJOR ISSUE IN THE AREA AS THEY CAUSE NOISE AND DUST AND YET ARE MANY FAMILIES SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT.
